ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Networking networks
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Ricardo, Charles, The idea of re-using copies of sub-networks and the problem of how to connect them up has indeed been discussed on this group in the past,

Hi Ricardo, Charles,

The idea of re-using copies of sub-networks and the problem of how to 
connect them up has indeed been discussed on this group in the past, and 
in fact experimental work has been done. A good place to start is this 
paper:

http://nn.cs.utexas.edu/downloads/papers/reisinger.gecco04.pdf

or just search on modular NEAT (both in the yahoo group and on google) 
and/or have a scan through the group archive - the subject has popped up 
quite a lot.

Colin.
